医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
英格兰流感和 COVID-19 疫苗计划将比计划提前启动作为识别出新的 COVID-19 变种后的预防措施，今年的秋季流感和 COVID-19 疫苗计划将在英格兰提前启动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Flu-and-COVID-19-vaccine-programs-to-start-earlier-than-planned-in-England.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Flu-and-COVID-19-vaccine-programs-to-start-earlier-than-planned-in-England.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47aed220-c2f9-49ad-b47b-367689d6af90 Wed, 30 Aug 2023 16:11:25 -0400 Flu and COVID-19 vaccine programs to start earlier than planned in England
科学家创建突变细菌库来研究抗生素耐药性现代医学依靠抗生素通过破坏细菌细胞内的靶标来治疗感染。一旦进入这些细胞，抗生素就会与特定酶靶点上的某些位点结合，以阻止细菌生长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Scientists-create-library-of-mutant-bacteria-to-study-antibiotic-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Scientists-create-library-of-mutant-bacteria-to-study-antibiotic-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b17bb03-d15c-42e0-a633-369ef3d66f9c Wed, 30 Aug 2023 16:08:00 -0400 Scientists create library of mutant bacteria to study antibiotic resistance
关于一种免疫细胞的新发现可能为改进免疫疗法铺平道路关于一种免疫细胞的新发现可以为肺癌患者提供更准确的预后，并更好地确定谁将从免疫疗法中受益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/New-discoveries-about-a-type-of-immune-cells-could-pave-the-way-for-improved-immunotherapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/New-discoveries-about-a-type-of-immune-cells-could-pave-the-way-for-improved-immunotherapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25f13866-bbc7-46b8-b4ce-c160df2b2524 Wed, 30 Aug 2023 15:55:44 -0400 New discoveries about a type of immune cells could pave the way for improved immunotherapies
吸烟会增加患抑郁症和双相情感障碍的风险我们大多数人都知道吸烟不健康。香烟包装上显示令人震惊的图片，警告患病的肺部和腐烂的牙齿。我们经常在媒体上听到吸烟如何导致各种癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Smoking-linked-to-increased-risk-of-depression-bipolar-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Smoking-linked-to-increased-risk-of-depression-bipolar-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=883c7478-546c-4337-86af-14a5f3689e84 Wed, 30 Aug 2023 15:37:37 -0400 Smoking linked to increased risk of depression, bipolar disorder
父母入狱的孩子患心血管疾病的风险更高心血管疾病仍然是美国黑人和白人死亡率种族差异的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Children-of-incarcerated-parents-at-higher-risk-for-cardioangio-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Children-of-incarcerated-parents-at-higher-risk-for-cardioangio-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b8ed4a2-414e-49a0-adc6-7ecd24e0e083 Wed, 30 Aug 2023 15:24:45 -0400 Children of incarcerated parents at higher risk for cardiovascular disease
研究发现高膳食磷与乳腺癌之间存在关联研究人员评估了乳腺癌发病率与不同膳食磷酸盐水平的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Study-finds-association- Between-high-dietary-phosphrus-and-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Study-finds-association- Between-high-dietary-phosphorus-and-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e0dc792-3b94-4faf-833d-3825104f6755 Wed, 30 Aug 2023 10:30:00 -0400 Study finds association between high dietary phosphorus and breast cancer
压力性生活事件和失眠可能会增加绝经后女性患房颤的风险绝经后，估计有四分之一的女性可能出现心律不齐；根据今天发表在《美国心脏协会杂志》（美国心脏协会的开放获取、同行评审期刊）上的最新研究，被称为心房颤动的人在一生中，压力性生活事件和失眠是主要的促成因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Stressful-life-events-and-insomnia-may-increase-risk-of-atrial-fibrillation-in-postmenopausal-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Stressful-life-events-and-insomnia-may-increase-risk-of-atrial-fibrillation-in-postmenopausal-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b3558ae-e88d-4a0a-a0cc-6db299ecebc8 Wed, 30 Aug 2023 09:58:04 -0400 Stressful life events and insomnia may increase risk of atrial fibrillation in postmenopausal women
运动可能有助于改善前列腺癌患者的性功能前列腺癌是世界上最常见的癌症之一，它不仅使被诊断者的生命处于危险之中，而且还会由于治疗的副作用而严重影响患者的生活质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Exercise-may-help-improve-sex-function-in-prostate-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Exercise-may-help-improve-sex-function-in-prostate-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ddfa320-263f-4551-b0e2-729beef2c3fa Wed, 30 Aug 2023 09:37:15 -0400 Exercise may help improve sexual function in prostate cancer patients
GADx 的 BotrytisAlert 现在可以检测葡萄酒生产中几个关键点的作物真菌病原体Global Access Diagnostics (GADx) 是一家社会企业，也是横向流动和快速诊断技术的领先开发商，今天宣布扩大了其低成本快速诊断测试 BotrytisAlert 的应用范围。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/GADxs-BotrytisAlert-now-detects-fungal-crop-pathogen-across-several-ritic-points-in-wine-products.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/GADxs-BotrytisAlert-now-detects-fungal-crop-pathogen-across-several-ritic-points-in-wine-product.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d14174eb-841d-4585-86b2-4ad3bee45d7c Wed, 30 Aug 2023 09:05:00 -0400 GADx's BotrytisAlert now detects fungal crop pathogen across several critical points in wine production
审查发现牛奶低聚糖与婴儿大脑发育之间的相关性在《营养》杂志最近发表的一篇文章中，研究人员调查了牛奶低聚糖 (MOS) 对早期神经认知和大脑发育影响的最新证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Review-finds-correlation- Between-milk-oligobiotics-and-infant-brain-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Review-finds-correlation- Between-milk-oligo Sugars-and-infant-brain-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0aa89a84-cfed-4823-9e6a-7be9cbb9bdde Wed, 30 Aug 2023 08:58:00 -0400 Review finds correlation between milk oligosaccharides and infant brain development
